subdisciplines.name: Astrobiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the origin, evolution, and distribution of life in the universe.

subdisciplines.name: Astrochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical reactions and properties of matter in space.

subdisciplines.name: Astrodynamics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior of objects in space, including spacecraft, planets, and stars.

subdisciplines.name: Cosmology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the origin, evolution, and eventual fate of the universe.

subdisciplines.name: Galactic Astronomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure, formation, and evolution of galaxies.

subdisciplines.name: High Energy Astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of astrophysical objects and phenomena that produce high-energy particles and radiation.

subdisciplines.name: Stellar Astronomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of stars, their properties, formation, and evolution.

subdisciplines.name: Astrochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical composition and processes of astrophysical objects, including stars, planets, and interstellar medium.

subdisciplines.name: Astrobiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the origin, evolution, and potential for life in the universe.

subdisciplines.name: Astrophysical Fluid Dynamics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior of fluids in astrophysical environments, including stars, galaxies, and interstellar medium.

subdisciplines.name: Gravitational Astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties and effects of gravity in astrophysical systems, including black holes, neutron stars, and gravitational waves.

subdisciplines.name: Stellar Astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties, evolution, and behavior of stars.
